Well I split my Finger open trying to open one up because after I opened it really hard my hand slipped an my Thumb was just destroyed.

(Haha, I remember going up to my mom and asking for a band-aid and she just flipped the fuck out)

topics.body: I can honestly say that the worst type of pain you can realistically feel without passing out is having surgery without pain killer.  I once had surgery and the pain killer failed mid surgery and sweet baby jesus and the orphans did that hurt beyond all rational belief or attempts to understand cause they were cutting through my skin to take out the bits and oh that did not feel good; that did not feel good at all.  If you're wondering how that felt imagine having knives slowly cut through you bit by bit and a all the medical tools slowly going through your body parts.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
